name.en: Seminar on Modern Chinese Political Culture

department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 近代東亞對國家與社會的想像與西方有不同面貌，本課程探討近代中國在現代性的實踐過程中，對“個人“、“國家“與“社會“的概念與西方有何不同。本課程除說明近代中國思考個人和民主自由時的特徵及其理念外，也將著眼於一般民眾日常生活中具體展現的政治與文化行為。希冀藉由思想人物的對話以及普通人日常生活的雙重面向，由近代中國面對西方衝擊過程中所建構的國家想像基礎，反思當代東亞政治格局與未來出路。
goal.en: Modern China has a different way of imagining “Nation“ from the West. This course explores the political ideology and reality of modern China, understanding the differences in ideas about “individual, state, and society“ between modern China and the West in the process of modernization. This course not only explores the ideas of modern Chinese intellectuals when they think about individuality 、democracy, and freedom but also focuses on the political culture embodied in the daily lives of ordinary people. We will focus on how modern China responds to Western challenges and make its new Nation and Society..

outline.ch:
1.導論
2.東亞近代政治思想課題
3.近代”國家”觀念的興起
4.日常⽣活敘事與國族想像
5.男人形象＆女性消費群體的民族化
6.從自在到自覺―國民性探討
7.創造新人和新社會—少年中國
8.     轉向自我: 近代政治思想史上的“個人“
9.    想像與真實：《新青年》再現的「啟蒙運動」
10.  中國近代思想脉絡中的自由主義
11.自由與限制: 康有為＆梁啟超的理念
12. 尋求富強:嚴復與西方
13.    幽暗意識與民主傳統
14.    民初政論界看法國大革命
15    盧梭《民約論》在中國: 共和主義
16.從「完全之人」到「完全平等」:劉師培政治思想 .
17.近代中國私人領域的政治化
18.期末報告
outline.en:
1. Introduction:
2. Trends of Political Thought in the Late Qing Dynasty
3. The Rise of the Modern Concept of “Nation“
4. Daily Life Narrative and National Imagination
5. Men‘s image ＆ Nationalism of female consumer groups
6. From Freedom to Consciousness - Exploration of Chinese
Nationalism
7. Creating New People and a New Society - Young China
8. Turning to Self: “Individuals“ in  Modern  Political Thought
9. Imagination and Reality: The “Enlightenment “ Reproduced
in “New Youth“
10. Liberalism in Modern Chinese Thought
11. Freedom and Restriction: Kang Youwei  ＆ Liang Qichao
12. Seeking Prosperity and Strength: Yan Fu and the West
13. Dark Consciousness and Democratic Tradition
14. The Political Critics of the Late Qing Dynasty about the French Revolution
15   Rousseau‘s “Treaty of the People“ in China: republicanism
16. From “Perfect Man“ to “Complete Equality“: Liu Shipei
17. Politicization of the Private Sector in Modern China
18. Final report

gradMethod.ch:
本課程將隨堂發放相關教材文章作為參考，學生閱讀指定教材，輪流於課堂上報告，並繳交閱讀摘要(2-3頁)。期末繳交專題報告或書評。

出席與討論(30％)/   課堂報告(30)/ 期末報告或書評(40％)。
gradMethod.en: Attendance and discussion (30％)/Classroom study report (30％)/Final Report or  Book Review (40％)

ch.competencies: 具備法政專業研究能力
具備掌握法政整合與時勢脈動的視野
具備社會人文關懷的精神
